live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53325.summary: Some customers in the Downtown Eastside area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53325.title: Sept 12 - Vancouver (Downtown Eastside) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Further issues in the area have been found.  Teams are back on site working towards a resolution.
Power has been restored and services should be restored.  We will continue to monitor.
We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.
53131.summary: Some customers in Jasper are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53131.title: Sept 12 - Jasper | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
